text: Dozvolyayutʹ ne tsey khto utrymuyutʹ ta zapasayutʹ BOZHI umovy dumayutʹ shcho tse ye harne dlya nykh; tse ye pohane dlya nykh. Dlya vony perevezutʹ yikhnye nakopychennya navkolo yikhnikh shyy na Dni Resurrection. BOH yavlyaye soboyu ostatochnyy inheritor neba ta zemli. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
